attributes.action: Stop mp’s claiming energy costs for 2nd Homes
attributes.additional_details:
What the government is doing is against the rule of law in the Uk 

You have people who are going to freeze to death , or die of hunger by going with out food and heating 

The government needs to put the needs of the  British people first 

You have people having £10,000 a year and having to pay £2,000 in energy costs , plus high inflation with food and fuel etc 

What the government is doing is against. Humanity and discrimination 

No one should have to live in poverty
attributes.background:
I want the giver not to descrimate vunerable and low paid workers by increasing their energy costs , while they are getting energy costs for free for 2nd homes 

There should be more help available for vulnerable and low income people in all areas of the Uk

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out how to contact IPSA here:

http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/contact-us/
